Question.Subject: Why can't i sign up to childline?
Question.Content: i have been trying and failing to sign up to the childline website. it will not accept any username i give at all. i have been trying for hours now and all i need is to talk to someone. this is really stressing me out. does anyone know why this happens? is it happening to you or just me? any help appreciated ♥
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Childline has several options that you can use to contact them. Below is the webpage. You can phone, send an email, etc.
http://www.childline.org.uk/Talk/Pages/Talk.aspx

Answer.Content:
Childline has several options that you can use to contact them. Below is the webpage. You can phone, send an email, etc.
http://www.childline.org.uk/Talk/Pages/Talk.aspx
